How do you describe your mother?
My mother is like an example of how to live your life to the fullest.
And not just smart, I mean, she's bright.
She's like sunshine, like all the time.
How often do you tell her how you feel?
I don't think I've actually said the words "I love you" to my mom in a long time.
She knows I love her, that goes without question.
I would like her to know that I feel it's my duty to make sure...
...she sees everything she wants to see in this life.
And enjoys herself as much as humanly possible.
